pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karothā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.11: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.14: “Na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.6: “Na udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.7: Na udake agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.8: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
